name: Gea: Rivals of the Earth
description:
A competitive couch-play multiplayer twin-stick shooter with runic weapons and powerful golems drenched with magic. 

It's single screen, arcane duel between two powerful beings bounded to the Arena. Who will win?

DEVELOPED BY: 

ACROMANTULE (EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL TURIN, YEAR 1 - 2017/2018)

GAME DESIGN:
Admir Hyka
Fabio Zanetta

PROGRAMMING:
Marco Elia
Lorenzo Masserano

3D ART:
Andrea Alliaud
Diego Lamattina

CONCEPT ART:
Edoardo Gamba
Tania Astone
